name: The Facility.
description:
The Facility is a Portal Themed Escape Room made in Unity3D. You play as  a test subject that has to complete a series of puzzles to escape.

Setup

Jazz music plays from wall mounted speakers. The glaring lights blind you as you open your eyes to see yourself in a completely empty waiting room. You find a piece of paper with a number on it. You hear a large DING come from a television, the number on the  piece of paper appears on screen and the door in the corner of the room opens.  How inviting. You walk through the door and into the long corridor ahead.  As you walk further in the lights start to shut off with a large THUD. The door closes behind you. Darkness.

You receive a note. "Welcome to The Facility."

Controls

Controls are that of a basic FPS Controller.

MovementW,A,S,DLooking AroundMouseInteractEExit InteractionEscFlashlightF Background

The Facility was built as a final coursework for AINT253 - Design Process Module for Computing and Games Development at Plymouth University. This Module focused on my ability to create an immersive and coherent user experience.

All documentation that was handed in will be available to download below for educational uses only.
